inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Tinea pedis infection confirmed as his diagnosis by the observation of segmented fungal hyphae during a microscopic KOH wet mount examination.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He didn't use ant topical ointment on the lesion and has no positive history for any underlying disease such as DM.

notes: 41 year old man with Tinea pedis infection, no underlying diseases or recent surgeries.
